title: West Nile virus detected in UK mosquitoes for first time
description: A UK Health Safety Agency spokesperson said the risk to the general public is "very low".

title: Birmingham council gets court order over bin lorry blocking
description: Birmingham City Council says it needs to fulfil its public health duty by clearing street waste.

title: Urgent mental health centres to open across England
description: The plans would allow people in acute mental distress to get treatment in hospital while also reducing A&E wait times.
